data.description: Validation reports wrong expected edge count. It calculates create_events - delete_events but doesn't account for re-created edges. Should count unique edge IDs from entity files, not derive from event log math.

properties.retrospective: Fixed by updating cmd_validate in both scripts/got_utils.py and cortical/got/cli/query.py to not compare legacy event log edge counts against TX backend entity files. Now shows entity file counts directly.

data.title: Fix validation edge discrepancy false positive
